en.name: Fusion Excavation
en.effect: Can be used if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Send 1 Rock-Type monster to the Graveyard from your hand and add 1 "Polymerization" Spell Card or 1 "Fusion" Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, you can change the added card to "Fossil Fusion." This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
